hello.output:
Hello %{u}! You are using CodeDoBo version %{v} by %{d} (https://github.com/codedobo). 
Use `modules` to see all modules!

modules.output:
You are using %{c} modules: %{m}! 
Use `module <Module>` for help
modules.message:
Help for module main: 
-`hello` » Get information about this bot 
-`Ping` (without command prefix) » The bot response to you if the bot can write in this channel and is online! 
-`modules` » Get information about the modules 

*-* Help for the main module *-*

help.title: Main module help
help.description:
`info` 
Get the info of the bot 
`mod [<Module>]` 
Get all modules or the help of one 
`ping` 
Ping this bot
